key.name: method-to-disable
key.description: Choose the method touchpad-indicator switch your touchpad On or Off. 'XInput' should work always, 'Synclient' needs the packet 'synclient' and has additional the possibility to switch Off only tap and scroll.

key.name: disable-touchpad-at-startup
key.description: Disables the touchpad at startup of touchpad-indicator automatically, if a mouse ist detected.
